Overview

This Privacy Policy explains how personal information is collected and handled when you visit syedbokhari.com.au and when you contact Syed Bokhari regarding behaviour support enquiries. This site is intended for professional enquiries and general contact.

Contact Form Processing

Formspree Third-Party Service

The contact form on this website is processed by Formspree, a secure third-party service. When you submit the form, the information you enter is transmitted to Formspree to deliver your message. Form submissions may be stored by Formspree and forwarded to the nominated email address.

Alternative Contact Methods

If you prefer not to use the form, you can contact me directly:

ğŸ“§ Email: syed@syedbokhari.com.au ğŸ“± Phone: 0411 072 466
âš ï¸

Sensitive Information Warning

Please do not include sensitive personal information in the website contact form. If you are an NDIS participant (or contacting on behalf of one), sensitive details should be shared only through appropriate, secure channels after initial contact and confirmation of arrangements.

Examples of information NOT to include in contact form:

âŒ Detailed medical history
âŒ NDIS plan numbers
âŒ Detailed behavioural incidents
âŒ Financial information
âŒ Legal documentation details
âŒ Third-party personal information
ğŸ”“

Storage and Security

Reasonable steps are taken to protect personal information from misuse, interference, loss, unauthorised access, modification, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet is completely secure.

Security Measures Include:

âœ… Secure third-party form processing
âœ… Encrypted email communication
âœ… Regular security updates
âœ… Professional supervision oversight
âœ… Limited access to information
âœ… Regular data review and cleanup
ğŸ“

Access and Correction

You may request access to personal information held about you and request corrections if you believe it is inaccurate, out of date, incomplete, irrelevant, or misleading.

How to Request Access or Correction:

1

Contact me directly via email or phone

2

Provide details of what information you want to access or correct

3

I will respond within a reasonable timeframe (usually within 30 days)
